languages.text: {n}Джай подбоченивается и смачно цокает языком, прямо {d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}бывалый гвардеец{/d}.{/n} "Эт ты точно такого блага себе желаешь, вашество? Можем устроить". {n}Под косые взгляды офицеров торговка заходится смехом.{/n} "Хо-ой, простите, шерин. Боюсь, меня настоящую такими темпами скоро из шлюза погулять попросят".

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай подбоченивается и смачно цокает языком, прямо бывалый гвардеец.{/n} "Эт ты точно такого блага себе желаешь, вашество? Можем устроить". {n}Под косые взгляды офицеров торговка зоходится смехом.{/n} "Хо-ой, простите, шерин. Боюсь, меня настоящую такими темпами скоро из шлюза погулял попросят".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae puts her fists on her hips and clucks her tongue, the very picture of a {d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Guardswoman{/d}.{/n} "Ya sure about that, m'{mf|lord|lady}? That can be arranged." {n}The sidelong looks from the surrounding officers prompt her to burst into laughter.{/n} "Oh my, I beg your forgiveness, shereen. I'm pretty sure the real me would earn herself a one-way trip to the airlock before the end of her first watch."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай подбоченивается и смачно цокает языком, прямо {d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}бывалый гвардеец{/d}.{/n} "Эт ты точно такого блага себе желаешь, вашество? Можем устроить". {n}Под косые взгляды офицеров торговка заходится смехом.{/n} "Хо-ой, простите, шерин. Боюсь, меня настоящую такими темпами скоро из шлюза погулять попросят".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae puts arms akimbo and clucks her tongue, the very picture of a typical guardswoman.{/n} "Ya sure, {mf|lordship|ladyship}? 'Cause I sure can accommodate you." {n}The officers stare at her in shock and she bursts into laughter.{/n} "Hoo boy, I beg your forgiveness, shereen. I fear that would earn me a one-way trip to the airlock in no time at all."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

That can be arranged." {n}The sidelong looks from the surrounding officers prompt her to burst into laughter.{/n} "Oh my, I beg your forgiveness, shereen. languages.text: {n}婕伊把拳头放在腰间，咬紧牙关，俨然一副{d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}帝国卫队成员{/d}的样子。{/n}“你确定要这样吗，大人？我倒是可以安排。”{n}周围军官对她侧目而视，她猛然大笑起来。{/n}“噢，我的天，我请求你原谅，亲爱的。我很肯定，如果是真正的我，恐怕在第一次值班结束之前，就会赢得一场通往气闸的单程旅行。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae puts her fists on her hips and clucks her tongue, the very picture of a {d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Guardswoman{/d}.{/n} "Ya sure about that, m'{mf|lord|lady}? That can be arranged." {n}The sidelong looks from the surrounding officers prompt her to burst into laughter.{/n} "Oh my, I beg your forgiveness, shereen. I'm pretty sure the real me would earn herself a one-way trip to the airlock before the end of her first watch."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊把拳头放在腰间，咬紧牙关，俨然一副帝国卫队成员的样子。{/n}“你确定要这样吗，大人？我倒是可以安排。”{n}周围军官对她侧目而视，她猛地大笑起来。{/n}“噢，我的天，我请求你原谅，亲爱的。我很肯定，如果是真正的我，恐怕在第一次值班结束之前，就会赢得一场通往气闸的单程旅行。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Jae puts her fists on her hips and clucks her tongue, the very picture of a Guardswoman.{/n} "Ya sure about that, m'{mf|lord|lady}? That can be arranged." {n}The sidelong looks from the surrounding officers prompt her to burst into laughter.{/n} "Oh my, I beg your forgiveness, shereen. I'm pretty sure the real me would earn herself a one-way trip to the airlock before the end of her first watch."

languages.text: {n}Jae se lleva los puños a las caderas y chasca la lengua en fiel representación de la actitud de una {d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}soldado de la Guardia Imperial{/d}.{/n} «¿Está segur{mf|o|a} de eso, señor{mf||a}? Podría hacerse». {n}Las miradas de reojo de los oficiales cercanos hacen que rompa a reír.{/n} «Ay, discúlpeme, shereen. Estoy bastante segura de que mi yo real se habría ganado un viaje de ida a la esclusa antes de que terminara su primera guardia».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae puts her fists on her hips and clucks her tongue, the very picture of a {d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Guardswoman{/d}.{/n} "Ya sure about that, m'{mf|lord|lady}? That can be arranged." {n}The sidelong looks from the surrounding officers prompt her to burst into laughter.{/n} "Oh my, I beg your forgiveness, shereen. I'm pretty sure the real me would earn herself a one-way trip to the airlock before the end of her first watch."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se lleva los puños a las caderas y chasca la lengua en fiel representación de la actitud de una soldado de la Guardia Imperial.{/n} «¿Está segur{mf|o|a} de eso, señor{mf||a}? Podría hacerse». {n}Las miradas de reojo de los oficiales cercanos hacen que rompa a reír.{/n} «Ay, discúlpeme, shereen. Estoy bastante segura de que mi yo real se habría ganado un viaje de ida a la esclusa antes de que terminara su primera guardia».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは腰に拳を当て、舌打ちをする。まさに{d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}防衛軍の女性{/d}といったふるまいだ。{/n}「本当にいいのかしら、閣下？手配はできるけれど」{n}周囲の士官たちの横目で、彼女は腹を抱えて笑った。{/n}「ああ、どうか許して、シャリーン。本当のあたしなら、彼女の最初のウォッチが終わる前に、エアロックへの片道切符を渡してやっていたに違いないわ」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae puts her fists on her hips and clucks her tongue, the very picture of a {d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Guardswoman{/d}.{/n} "Ya sure about that, m'{mf|lord|lady}? That can be arranged." {n}The sidelong looks from the surrounding officers prompt her to burst into laughter.{/n} "Oh my, I beg your forgiveness, shereen. I'm pretty sure the real me would earn herself a one-way trip to the airlock before the end of her first watch."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは腰に拳を当て、舌打ちをする。まさに{d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}防衛軍の女性{/d}といったふるまいだ。{/n}「本当にいいのかしら、閣下？手配はできるけれど」{n}周囲の士官たちの横目で、彼女は腹を抱えて笑った。{/n}「ああ、どうか許して、シャリーン。本当のあたしなら、彼女の最初のウォッチが終わる前に、エアロックへの片道切符を渡してやっていたに違いないわ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae stemmt die Fäuste in die Hüften und schnalzt tadelnd mit der Zunge, das Klischee einer {d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Soldatin{/d}.{/n} "Seid Ihr Euch da sicher, {mf|Lord|Lady}? Das lässt sich einrichten." {n}Die schiefen Blicke der Offiziere lassen Jae in schallendes Gelächter ausbrechen.{/n} "Oh, ich bitte vielmals um Vergebung, Shereen. Ich bin mir recht sicher, dass mein wahres Ich sich noch vor dem Ende seiner ersten Wache einen Freiflug aus der Luftschleuse verdienen würde."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae puts her fists on her hips and clucks her tongue, the very picture of a {d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Guardswoman{/d}.{/n} "Ya sure about that, m'{mf|lord|lady}? That can be arranged." {n}The sidelong looks from the surrounding officers prompt her to burst into laughter.{/n} "Oh my, I beg your forgiveness, shereen. I'm pretty sure the real me would earn herself a one-way trip to the airlock before the end of her first watch."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae stemmt die Fäuste in die Hüften und schnalzt tadelnd mit der Zunge, das Klischee einer Soldatin.{/n} "Seid Ihr Euch da sicher, {mf|Lord|Lady}? Das lässt sich einrichten." {n}Die schiefen Blicke der Offiziere lassen Jae in schallendes Gelächter ausbrechen.{/n} "Oh, ich bitte vielmals um Vergebung, Shereen. Ich bin mir recht sicher, dass mein wahres Ich sich noch vor dem Ende seiner ersten Wache einen Freiflug aus der Luftschleuse verdienen würde."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae met ses mains sur ses hanches et fait claquer sa langue, imitant à la perfection une {d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}garde{/d}.{/n} « Z'en êtes bien sûr, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame} ? Ça doit pouvoir s'arranger. » {n}Les regards en coin que lui lancent les officiers de la passerelle la font éclater de rire.{/n} « Oh, je vous demande pardon, shereen. Vous pouvez être {mf|sûr|sûre} que la vraie Jae gagnerait un aller simple pour le sas avant la fin de sa première journée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae puts her fists on her hips and clucks her tongue, the very picture of a {d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Guardswoman{/d}.{/n} "Ya sure about that, m'{mf|lord|lady}? That can be arranged." {n}The sidelong looks from the surrounding officers prompt her to burst into laughter.{/n} "Oh my, I beg your forgiveness, shereen. I'm pretty sure the real me would earn herself a one-way trip to the airlock before the end of her first watch."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae met ses mains sur ses hanches et fait claquer sa langue, imitant à la perfection une garde.{/n} « Z'en êtes bien sûr, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame} ? Ça doit pouvoir s'arranger. » {n}Les regards en coin que lui lancent les officiers de la passerelle la font éclater de rire.{/n} « Oh, je vous demande pardon, shereen. Vous pouvez être {mf|sûr|sûre} que la vraie Jae gagnerait un aller simple pour le sas avant la fin de sa première journée. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae, yumruklarını kalçalarına dayayıp dilini şaklatarak tam bir {d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}İmparatorluk Muhafızı{/d} portresi çiziyor.{/n} "Eminsin midir {mf|beyim|hanımım}? Ayarlarız be ya." {n}Yandan yandan onu izleyen subaylar, Jae'ın kahkahalara boğulmasına sebep oluyor.{/n} "Affet beni şirinim. Eminim ki gerçek kişiliğim, daha ilk nöbeti bitmeden hava kilidine tek yönlü bir bileti kapardı."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae puts her fists on her hips and clucks her tongue, the very picture of a {d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Guardswoman{/d}.{/n} "Ya sure about that, m'{mf|lord|lady}? That can be arranged." {n}The sidelong looks from the surrounding officers prompt her to burst into laughter.{/n} "Oh my, I beg your forgiveness, shereen. I'm pretty sure the real me would earn herself a one-way trip to the airlock before the end of her first watch."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae yumruklarını kalçalarına dayayarak ve dilini şaklatarak tam bir İmparatorluk muhafızı portresi çiziyor.{/n} "Eminsin midir {mf|beyim|hanımım}? Ayarlarız be ya." {n}Yandan yandan onu izleyen subaylar Jae'ın kahkahalara boğulmasına sebep oluyor.{/n} "Ah, affet beni şirinim. Eminim ki gerçek kişiliğim daha ilk nöbeti bitmeden kendisini hava kilidine tek kişilik bir bilet almış hâlde bulur."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
